channel.title: Players are kicked when login
channel.description:
When players log into my server there char file is not found.. duh
but then they get disconnected and i think banned. i have had this problem before and forgot what to do.
Help please.
[code]Crazyness-Scape Server. Connection from 85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arrownet.dk:17528 Custom rs: character file not found. [client-2-Elder sage]: command: players Game saved for player Elder sage ClientHandler: Client Elder sage disconnected (71-221-92-146.eugn.qwest.net) Game saved for player Custom rs ClientHandler: Client Custom rs disconnected (85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arro wnet.dk) Connection from 85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arrownet.dk:17538 [client-2-Custom rs]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 13 ms] Game saved for player Custom rs ClientHandler: Client Custom rs disconnected (85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arro wnet.dk) Connection from 85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arrownet.dk:17541 [client-2-Custom rs]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 8 ms] Game saved for player Custom rs ClientHandler: Client Custom rs disconnected (85.24.98.143.generic-hostname.arro wnet.dk) [/code]
ALSO THIS SEEMS TO HAPPEN AFTER A CUSTOM CHAR HAS BEEN MADE![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 08:47:38 am[/size][hr]I have tried getting rid of the design char interface now to see if it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 08:54:44 am[/size][hr]it did not work and please somone reply

item.title: Players are kicked when login
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

There probebly not using your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Players are kicked when login
item.dc:creator: @madmanisbad2 madmanisbad2
item.description:
@madmanisbad2 wrote:

xxx123xxx:

or maybe server isnt allowing the client, looks like you need the client that you probebly leached your server from.

I have got it and using it i just changed ip and background names and stuff on it
infact some guy got on and i asked him if he was on client and he was.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 04:45:08 pm[/size][hr]can someone please tell me whats wrong most ppl ivehad on is 2 =[

Read full topic
